author: cbs8
title: Genesis Gaming Announces the Triple Play Release of the Brand New Video Slot Escape Artist, Available Exclusively at Unibet Casino
text:
Genesis Gaming
LONDON , September 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
- Larry Linguini Stacked Wilds Unlock Big Wins in this Bewitching Slot Game
Genesis Gaming is excited to announce the release of the bewitching brand new video slot The Escape Artist, available exclusively at Unibet Casino.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150805/255608LOGO )
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150910/265322 )
Designed for "Triple Play" release, Escape Artist will be available in desktop (Flash), mobile (HTML5) and Spin City application (Native iOS/Android) formats. The Spin City application will feature the game in coming weeks.
Captivating characters and haunting sounds set the stage in The Escape Artist, an intriguing 5 reel, 50 line video slot. Larry Linguini was an unknown magician, until he signed a deal with the Devil to become the world's greatest Escape Artist. But the deal might not be quite what he bargained for.
Three or more Scatters trigger the Great Escape Free Spins Bonus featuring Stacked Wilds. When part of Larry Linguini's tank appears on the reels he will slide to fill the reel with Wilds as he tries to escape. During the free spins, three or more Scatters will award another ten free spins.
"The opportunity for large wins in this game is complimented and well balanced by the vivid art and animations. We design our games to be engaging for the true gambler, yet entertaining for the more casual player." said Scott Sims , Head of Global Design at Genesis Gaming.
"The game has elements of both humour and fright, providing lots of entertaining fun for players," said James Watson , Director of European Sales for Genesis Gaming. "To build on the story, the rich multimedia combines well with the compelling bonus feature."
This game is optimized for Flash, HTML5 and Native formats and is available to play right now at Unibet.
To play a demo of the game and for more information click here .
View the Escape Artist teaser by clicking here .
About Genesis Gaming
As a key supplier of slot content to the most prominent manufacturers and operators in the casino gaming industry, Genesis Gaming has built its reputation on providing casino gaming content that maximizes revenue for our customers. With over 150 video slot games produced, Genesis has world-class game designers and develops games for all digital platforms whether they are land-based, online or mobile, and for real-money or social gaming play. More information on Genesis can be found at: http://www.gen-game.com
Contact: James Watson , Director, European Sales, +44(0)20-7036-0775, james.w@gen-game.com
